comment.author: 69662531@N05
comment._content:
Probate records have this:

Thompson Herbert William of 373 Fulham Palace Road Fulham Middlesex second-lieutenant HM Army died on or since 1 July 1916 in France. Administration (with Will) London 1 August 1917 to Albert William Thompson retired oil and colourman.
Effects £169
Former Grant PR June 1917 revoked

comment.author: 69662531@N05
comment._content:
CWGC has this:

THOMPSON, HERBERT WILLIAM
Rank: Second Lieutenant
Date of Death: 01/07/1916
Age: 21
Regiment/Service: East Lancashire Regiment  10th Bn. attd. 11th Bn.
Panel Reference Pier and Face 6 C.
Memorial THIEPVAL MEMORIAL
Additional Information:
Son of Albert William Thompson, of 67, Kenyon St., Fulham Palace Rd., London.
